Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde national football team were the first nation to qualify for the Round of 16. Being involved in a group that had Egypt and Ghana, still the Blue Sharks topped their Group B table.

Mauritania national football team were clubbed with Angola, Burkina Faso and 2019 AFCON winners, Algeria in Group D. After two back-to-back defeats, none would have predicted them beating the Desert Warriors in the final group game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The winner from this Round of 16 battle will take on either Morocco or South Africa
Others: The match will take place on Monday, 29 January 2024 at 5:00 PM UK (10:30 PM IST) at Stade Félix Houphouët-Boigny
Bebé, a former Manchester United winger, is expected to trouble Mauritania on many occasions
Babacar Niasse, standing at 1.96 metres tall, made 5 crucial saves in the matchday 3 against Algeria
